Package problem3

Class TaxFiler

java.lang.Object
problem3.TaxFiler
Direct Known Subclasses:
GroupFiler, IndividualFilter
public abstract class TaxFiler extends Object
abstract class for all tax filer

  • Constructor Details

    • TaxFiler

      public TaxFiler(String taxID, ContactInfo contactInfo, double lastYearEarning, double paidIncomeTax, double paidMortgageInterest, double paidPropertyTax, double paidStudentLoanTuition, double contributionsRetirementSaving, double contributionHealthSaving, double charitableDonationContribution)
      Parameters:
      taxID - unique tax filer’s identifier
      contactInfo - class contact info that store tax filer information
      lastYearEarning - Last year’s earnings
      paidIncomeTax - Total income tax already paid
      paidMortgageInterest - Mortgage interest paid
      paidPropertyTax - Property taxes
      paidStudentLoanTuition - Student loan and tuition paid
      contributionsRetirementSaving - Contributions made to a retirement savings account
      contributionHealthSaving - Contributions made to a health savings account
      charitableDonationContribution - Charitable donations and contributions
